name: Gamble Away
description:
If you or someone you know has an addiction to gambling please call the national gambling addiction hotline 1-800-522-4700.

Description

A simple to play card game where you can bet virtual chips.

Roll the dice, flip the corresponding cards, and match the winning card to win!

Or match the winning card suit to get back the chips you bet!

Watch out for the Bad Luck card, if you flip it you lose!
